# The `PassInfoMixin` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A CRTP mix-in to automatically provide informational APIs needed for passes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A CRTP mix-in to automatically provide informational APIs needed for passes.

This provides some boilerplate for types that are passes.

Definition at line 69 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h">PassManager.h</a>.
